https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4IuCuNwPJ3k7vA0ggiRrSXqoht4.jpg Sarah (Ann Eleonora JÃ¸rgensen) and David (Magnus Crepper) meet for the first time in ten years when she arrives at his summer residence. David needs help finishing a play, which turns out to be a dramatization of their long, troublesome relationship. The film presents three love stories about seemingly different couples; all named Sarah and David, but played by different actors in respectively their 20s, 30s and 40s. All the Beauty
